import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['../../styles.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { } Homepage grid

Home Page

Flashcards

Welcome to the amazing world of brain-engaging flashcards! Whether you are studying for exams, learning a new language, or just want to expand your knowlegde, we've got you covered. Our website offers a wide range of topics, from languages, countries of the world, different dishes and much more. You will find interactive quizes, engaging visuals, and helpful explanations to make learning fun and effective. But that's not all! We also provide personalized study tools to help you. Nothing is impossible for those who want to try, it is all about making leaning a breeze!

Norway

Learn a new language!

German

Test your skills about different dishes!

America

Learn world geography the easy way!
